description:
While cleaning the storeroom, Javelin and the others find a mysterious
treasure chest with Laffey inside! But it seems like Laffey`s lost her
memory?! How will they possibly get their precious friend`s memory back?
Well, you`ll just have to see for yourself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friends Are Our Most Important Treasure
Taisetsu na Takaramono, Sore ga Nakama-tachi
大切な宝物, それが仲間たち
